channel.title: Port forwarding on actiontech with verizon FIOS please help
channel.description: Ok, heres my problem i recently sqitched from brighthouse (time warner) to verzin FIOS. on fios i cannot run another router because its a router and motem built in one. i had a linksys server up and running for about 3 days straight till the computer pretty much died. so now im hosting a new one in my room at my desktop but i am not able to access it. please look at the pictures below to see what ive done. Ok i access my router and go through the firewall bs heres link to pics, comps being gay so cant put img codes: http://s45.photobucket.com/albums/f84/xgdxclan/Moparscape/ please help, im in desperate need if you need more info pm me

item.title: Port forwarding on actiontech with verizon FIOS please help
item.dc:creator: @scardius scardius
item.description:
@scardius wrote:

Ok, heres my problem i recently sqitched from brighthouse (time warner) to verzin FIOS. on fios i cannot run another router because its a router and motem built in one. i had a linksys server up and running for about 3 days straight till the computer pretty much died. so now im hosting a new one in my room at my desktop but i am not able to access it. please look at the pictures below to see what ive done.
